docs.snippet: A widespread movement for standardization of methods and materials is now under way in Latin America and business men of the United States must see to it that our technical and quality standards get consideration in the compilation of such data if...
docs.lead_paragraph: A widespread movement for standardization of methods and materials is now under way in Latin America and business men of the United States must see to it that our technical and quality standards get consideration in the compilation of such data if postwar trade is to be maintained, Cyrus T. Brady Jr., field representative of the American Standards Association, daclared yesterday.
docs.abstract: C T Brady on Latin-Amer program

headline.main: URGES BIG U.S. ROLE IN LATIN STANDARDS; Brady Stresses Vital Relation to Our Trade of Expanding So. American Program
